title: SWIG: tutorial package generates "unhandled relocation" error
body:
by **Sbarra.Paul**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?
If possible, include a link to a program on play.golang.org.
1. extract attached zip file
2. set GOPATH to the extracted go folder
3. cd go/src/example
4. go build
5. go install
6. cd ../hello
7. go build

What is the expected output?
Successful compilation 

What do you see instead?
# hello
x_wrap_fact: unhandled relocation for _wrap_fact (type 28 rtype 120)
x_wrap_fact: missing section for _wrap_fact
x_wrap_fact: reloc 120 to non-elf symbol _wrap_fact (outer=_wrap_fact) 28


Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?
6g

Which operating system are you using?
Arch linux

Which version are you using?  (run 'go version')
go version devel +24ea55b48f9f Sun Sep 29 10:34:41 2013 +1000 linux/amd64

Please provide any additional information below.
This appears similar to issue #5545 which is marked as fixed.
Attachments: 1. example.zip (1723 bytes)
